projectNameDisplay: Pixel Art Purgatory: A Generative Soul-Searching Adventure

imageAssets.description: Pixel art sprite sheet for the player character. Includes idle (4 frames), run (6 frames), and jump (3 frames) animations, all facing right. Style: 8-bit pixel art, simple design, blue color palette.
imageAssets.purpose: Player character sprite sheet for animations

imageAssets.description: Pixel art sprite for a basic ground/solid tile. Style: 8-bit pixel art, simple texture, grey/brown color palette.
Pixel art sprite for a hazard tile (e.g., spikes). Style: 8-bit pixel art, red color palette, clear hazard indication.
Pixel art sprite for the level goal. Style: 8-bit pixel art, glowing/bright yellow color palette, distinct shape.
Pixel art sprite sheet for a basic patrolling enemy. Includes movement animation (4 frames), facing right. Style: 8-bit pixel art, simple design, red color palette.
Pixel art sprite for a collectible item (e.g., a glowing orb). Style: 8-bit pixel art, small, bright, animated (implied by multiple frames in sheet or just draw as single frame), various colors.
Pixel art sprite for a power-up item (e.g., a star or icon representing effect). Style: 8-bit pixel art, distinct from collectibles, bright color, perhaps an icon for speed or shield.
